targets.query: select sub_code from systemd_units where $timeFilter and  "name" = 'iptables.service' group by host
select active_code from systemd_units where $timeFilter and "name" = 'iptables.service' group by host
select mount_health from es_mount where $timeFilter and disk_type = 'mgs' GROUP BY host,disk_name
select mount_health from es_mount where $timeFilter and disk_type = 'mdt' GROUP BY host,disk_name
select mount_health from es_mount where $timeFilter and disk_type = 'ost' GROUP BY host,disk_name
select health_state from lustre_disk_health where $timeFilter and disk_type = 'mdt' GROUP BY host,"name"
select health_state from lustre_disk_health where $timeFilter and disk_type = 'ost' GROUP BY host,"name"
select used_percent from disk where $timeFilter and  host =~ /$host$/ and fstype != 'lustre'  and fstype != 'iso9660' GROUP BY path
select used_percent from disk where $timeFilter and  host =~ // and fstype != 'lustre'  and fstype != 'iso9660' GROUP BY path, host
SELECT derivative("bytes_recv", 1m) FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter  group by "interface"
SELECT derivative("bytes_sent", 1m) FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter  group by "interface"
select total from processes where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select zombies from processes where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select last(uptime) from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select err_in from net where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/ GROUP BY interface
select err_out from net where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/ GROUP BY interface
select err_in from net where $timeFilter and host =~ // GROUP BY interface,host
select err_out from net where $timeFilter and host =~ // GROUP BY interface, host
select usage_idle from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage_system from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage_user from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage_iowait from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load1 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load5 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load15 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load5 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ // group by host
select symbol_error from infiniband where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/ group by device
select symbol_error from infiniband where $timeFilter and host =~ // group by host,device
select used_percent from mem where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select available_percent from mem where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select used_percent from mem where $timeFilter and host =~ // group by host
